import React from "react"; import "../../../Styles/Pages/Forums/ForumsCard.scss"; import logo from "../../../Assets/svg/logo.svg"; function ForumsCard({ bgImg, title, bigTitle, opacity }) { return (

{title}

); } export default ForumsCard;
